alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 16 at 5:29AM PDT until April 16 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches, heaviest above 3000 feet. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades and foothills above 2000 feet. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 9 PM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Periods of snow will make driving difficult due to slippery roads and poor visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest, steadiest snow is expected midday through early afternoon Saturday, then precipitation should turn more showery and decrease in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades
